events.name: Cobalt Supply Chain Risk Assessment
events.wd_description: To investigate the impact of geopolitical risks and demand shocks of EVs on the cobalt supply chain system.
events.description: To investigate the impact of geopolitical risks and demand shocks of EVs on the cobalt supply chain system.

events.name: EV Demand Shock
events.wd_description: Increased demand for electric vehicles (EVs) has led to increased cobalt demand.
events.description: Increased demand for electric vehicles (EVs) has led to increased cobalt demand.

events.name: Geopolitical Risk
events.wd_description: Geopolitical changes have increased the risk of cobalt supply disruption.
events.description: Geopolitical changes have increased the risk of cobalt supply disruption.

events.name: Cobalt Price Increase
events.wd_description: The reduction of cobalt imports under geopolitical risks has a direct impact on cobalt prices and produces a superimposed effect.
events.description: The reduction of cobalt imports under geopolitical risks has a direct impact on cobalt prices and produces a superimposed effect.

events.name: Recycling Technology Improvement
events.wd_description: Improving recycling technology can mitigate the impact of cobalt supply disruption.
events.description: Improving recycling technology can mitigate the impact of cobalt supply disruption.

events.name: Inventory Management
events.wd_description: Effective inventory management can help mitigate the impact of cobalt supply disruption.
events.description: Effective inventory management can help mitigate the impact of cobalt supply disruption.

events.name: Material Substitution
events.wd_description: Substituting materials can help mitigate the impact of cobalt supply disruption.
events.description: Substituting materials can help mitigate the impact of cobalt supply disruption.

events.name: price impacts
events.wd_description: Cobalt prices are directly affected by supply disruptions due to geopolitical risks, leading to significant price increases.
events.description: Cobalt prices are directly affected by supply disruptions due to geopolitical risks, leading to significant price increases.

events.name: Price dynamics
events.description: This includes the detailed changes in cobalt prices due to varying levels of supply disruption and demand changes.
